[Cross posted from my Bryght blog.]

Come one, come all, Drupal newbies, users and developers are welcome. Love to see everybody in Portland at this BOF in Room D136 7:30-8:30p.m. It is FREE (must register beforehand).

From Open Source Community and Citizen Journalism Communities with Drupal - O'Reilly Open Source Convention - August 1-5, 2005 - Portland, OR.:

QUOTE

In the past year, Drupal has gone from a secret weapon used by those "in the know" to powering many of today's leading online community sites. E.g. Spread Firefox, Planet Cocoon, BaitCar, Urban Vancouver, Philly Future, BlufftonToday, etc. At this BOF, learn from the Drupal community and Drupal entities like Bryght and Civic Space about the Drupal best practices for creating online community. All are welcome including Drupal users and developers and newbies. We can all learn from each other.

UNQUOTE
